author: Bill J
title: Stayed for a show at The Beacon Theater
text:
First time there. Don't know why as we visit NYC about 6 times a year. Now our "go-to" place. It's like having your own apartment in the Upper West Side. Close to shops etc. Great supermarket across the street. Staff was super. Room was immaculate. What a great location for a show at the Beacon Theater (Acoustically the best venue in NYC). You can get take-outs from the Beacon Bar for some dining in before a show, or, visit several great restaurants in a 10 block radius. Upper West Side is way cool. Laid back compared to Theater District hotels. Price was nice too.
